original_text: As the Lord was with my lord the king, so may he be with Solomon to make his throne even greater than the throne of my lord King David!”
korean_text: 또 여호와께서 내 주 왕과 함께 계심 같이 솔로몬과 함께 계셔서 그의 왕위를 내 주 다윗 왕의 왕위보다 더 크게 하시기를 원하나이다 하니라

sentences.original_text: As the Lord was with my lord the king,
sentences.korean_translation: 주님께서 나의 주 왕과 함께 계셨던 것처럼,

sentences.original_text: so may he be with Solomon
to make his throne even greater
than the throne of my lord King David!
